meanings.definition: Any of the main continuous expanses of land on the earth's surface.
meanings.sent1: There are seven continents on Earth.
meanings.sent2: People live on different continents around the world.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to have a dance party that included all seven continents.
meanings.sent4: Her love for travel spanned across continents like a never-ending adventure.
meanings.sent5: The continents looked like giant puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The mainland of Europe as distinct from the British Isles.
meanings.sent1: Europe is a continent with many countries.
meanings.sent2: The British Isles are not part of the European continent.
meanings.sent3: The continent of Europe waved goodbye to the British Isles as they sailed away.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as solid as the connection between Europe and the British Isles, two distinct continents.
meanings.sent5: The continent of Europe stood tall, proud of its rich history and culture.
